about_the_game:
Dive into a Neon Puzzle Wonderland!
Embark on an electrifying journey through a vibrant, neon-infused world filled with mind-bending puzzles and exhilarating platform challenges! Whether you're a solo adventurer or love teaming up with friends, this game delivers a unique blend of creativity, strategy, and heart-pounding gameplay.

🌟 Key Features:

🎮 275 Singleplayer Levels

Immerse yourself in a massive collection of handcrafted levels that will push your skills to the limit. Each level introduces new mechanics, requiring you to think outside the box and conquer increasingly challenging puzzles. Are you up for the ultimate test of strategy and precision?

🤝 40 Multiplayer Levels

Grab a friend and take on the challenge together! These multiplayer-exclusive levels are designed to test not just your platforming abilities, but also your teamwork and communication. Can you both make it to the portal in one piece?

🔥 100+ Exciting PvP Levels

Dive into the competitive side of the game with over 100 unique PvP levels designed to challenge your skills and strategy. Each level offers distinct maps, mechanics, and obstacles to keep the gameplay fresh and engaging. Prove your dominance, adapt your tactics, and rise to the top in this thrilling multiplayer experience!

🎶 Atmospheric Soundtracks & Stunning Visuals

Lose yourself in a neon dream with immersive soundtracks and stunningly designed assets. Every beat and visual cue enhances your gameplay experience, pulling you deeper into this mesmerizing world.

💎 Hidden Treasure Hunt

Explore the game’s mysterious corners and uncover hidden treasures! A thrilling treasure hunt awaits, taking you beyond the levels and into a world of secrets and surprises.

🐣 Easter Eggs

Keep your eyes peeled for pop culture references and hidden gems scattered throughout the game. Can you spot them all?

This isn’t just a puzzle platformer—it’s an adventure packed with surprises, challenges, and unforgettable moments. Whether you're aiming to master the mechanics, discover every secret, or simply enjoy the neon vibes, there's something here for every gamer.

Are you ready to take on the neon challenge? Add the game to your wishlist now and start your journey today!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4096MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A neon-themed 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate intricate levels, solve physics-based challenges, and avoid obstacles to reach the portal. Play solo or with a friend in a visually stunning retro-futuristic world that tests your precision and strategic thinking.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
